name: CYSHIRC Official Website
description: Workspace configuration for the CYSHIRC (嘉義高中資訊研究社) official website built with SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS
system_prompt: You are working with the CYSHIRC Official Website codebase. This is a modern web application built with SvelteKit 5, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. The website serves as the official platform for the CYSHIRC Information Research Club at Chiayi Senior High School. It features responsive design, interactive components, event management, and social media integration. The codebase follows modern Svelte 5 patterns with $state and $effect reactivity, uses Tabler icons, and has a consistent design system with crimson primary colors.

groups.name: Project Configuration & Setup
groups.description: Core project configuration files including package.json, build tools, TypeScript config, and development setup
groups.system_prompt: These files define the project's dependencies, build configuration, development scripts, and tooling setup. This includes SvelteKit configuration, TypeScript settings, ESLint/Prettier rules, and development environment setup.

groups.name: Main Layout & Navigation
groups.description: Main layout component, navigation system, and global page structure
groups.system_prompt: These files define the main layout structure, navigation components, header, footer, and global page wrapper. The layout includes responsive navigation with mobile menu, active link highlighting, and consistent styling across all pages.

groups.name: Home Page
groups.description: Main homepage with hero section, event carousel, features showcase, and call-to-action
groups.system_prompt: The homepage features a dynamic image carousel, upcoming events display, feature cards, and responsive design. It uses Svelte 5 reactivity with $state and $effect for carousel functionality and data fetching.

groups.name: Component System
groups.description: Reusable UI components including cards, buttons, and layout elements
groups.system_prompt: These are reusable Svelte components that follow the design system. Components include EventCard, FeatureCard, and Footer with consistent styling, hover effects, and responsive behavior.

groups.name: Utilities & Helpers
groups.description: Utility functions for events, features, icons, and data transformation
groups.system_prompt: Utility functions for handling events, features, icons, and data transformation. Includes date formatting, event filtering, icon mapping, and data structure transformation.

groups.name: Data Types & Definitions
groups.description: TypeScript type definitions for events, features, icons, and data structures
groups.system_prompt: TypeScript type definitions that provide type safety for the application. Includes interfaces for events, features, icons, and their relationships.

groups.name: Data & Content
groups.description: Static data files for events, features, and website content
groups.system_prompt: JSON data files that provide content for the website. Includes event listings, feature descriptions, and statistics. These files are imported and transformed by utility functions.

groups.name: Styling System
groups.description: CSS/SCSS styles, theme variables, and design system configuration
groups.system_prompt: The styling system uses SCSS with CSS custom properties for theming. Includes color variables, mixins for buttons and containers, and responsive design utilities.

groups.name: Build & Deployment
groups.description: Build configuration, static adapter setup, and deployment settings
groups.system_prompt: Configuration for building and deploying the static website. Includes SvelteKit static adapter configuration and build optimization settings.
